title: Memories
lyrics:
Ttaseuhan balam-i seuchyeo jinagago
Honjain sigandeuldo neul-eogago
Dul-ila moshaessdeon neuj-eun bam sul hanjan
Pyeonhage chingudo mannaneunde nan
Eojewa daleun haludeul

Meol-eojin geu naldeul-i neol buleugo iss-eo



Salang-i dasi dol-aomyeon

Geunal-i omyeon haengboghal tende

Geudaega meomuldeon jaliga

Ijhyeojijil anh-a geuttae uli



Sigan-eul ttalaganeun gil

Heut-eojin jogagdeul-i nal buleugo iss-eo



Salang-i dasi dol-aomyeon

Geunal-i omyeon haengboghal tende

Geudaega meomuldeon jaliga

Ijhyeojijil anh-a geuttae uli



Aedalpi uneun ma-eum an-e jinan gieog-i

Eoneusaenga naege seumyeodeul-eo dasi neol buleunda

Umkyeojwilyeo haedo jabhiji anhneun gieog-eun

Ij-jineun mal-ajwo

Salang



Salang-i dasi dol-aomyeon

Geunal-i omyeon haengboghal tende

Geudaega meomuldeon jaliga

Ijhyeojijil anh-a geuttae uli

Uli
